Title: Rebirth
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Marguerite MacIntyre, Julie Plec, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries")
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Hayley struggles with her powers. Marcel sides with Klaus and gets revenge over the wolves. Esther is busy plotting her own plans. Everyone wants control over the city.
